job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: morpheus space is creating an ecosysyem for satellite mobility in space through a novel approach a new solution has been created to plan manage and coordinate large networks constellations of satellites as one entity through deep reinforcement learning we are changing the way satellite missions are designed and operatedltbrgtltbrgtyou willltbrgt conduct ambitious product development in reinforcement learning and adaptive control that solves open problems of high practical and ethical value and validate it in realworld applications ltbrgt collaborate with other researchers and engineers in a multidisciplinary team to discuss develop and implement the product development agenda ltbrgt write code that will be used in the space industry on a large scale ltbrgt design and implement experiments to test research ideas on a variety of problems ltbrgtltbrgtare you passionate about satellites innovative technology and new space do you want to be part of an international team and help shape the future of our planet as well as space ltbrgtwe should get to know each other if you ltbrgt are a creative problem solver who can use every asset at their disposal ltbrgt have experience solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches ltbrgt have experience coding in c python java or other similar language ltbrgt have published at highimpact conferencesjournals eg corl iclr neurips icml uai rss icra colt cdc ldc cvpr iccv eccv pami ijcv etc ltbrgt have work authorization in us ltbrgt are a team player like to solve problems independently and reliably and bring in new ideas ltbrgt are willing to revolutionize the space industry
